member.name: T:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.TreeViewNavigator
member.summary: A control for TreeView-based navigation within a Silverlight application.

member.name: T:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Navigator
member.summary: An abstract base class for controls that represent a Sitemap.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Navigator.CurrentSourceProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the CurrentSource for this Navigator. This is usually bound to the CurrentSource property of a Frame control.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Navigator.ItemTemplateProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the template that is used to display each node in the Sitemap. Its DataContext is a SitemapNodeProxy.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Navigator.PrincipalProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the Principal used for Sitemap trimming.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Navigator.SitemapHeaderTemplateProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for displaying the Sitemap header (usually used to display the Sitemap's title and description).

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Navigator.SitemapHeaderVisibilityProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility of the Sitemap header.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Navigator.SitemapProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the Sitemap being represented by this Navigator.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Navigator.TrimmedSitemapProperty
member.summary: Gets the trimmed Sitemap.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Navigator.TrimSitemapProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether Sitemap trimming based on the Principal is enabled.

member.summary: Creates a Navigator.

member.summary: Removes proxies and clears the TrimmedSitemap.

member.summary: Called when CurrentSource changes.

member.summary: Called when the Sitemap property is changed.

member.summary: Called when the TrimmedSitemap changes.

member.summary: Gets or sets the CurrentSource for this Navigator. This is usually bound to the CurrentSource property of a Frame control.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether Sitemap trimming based on the Principal is enabled.

member.summary: Represents a customized ComboBox that is used within the BreadCrumbNavigator.

member.summary: Refreshes BreadCrumbNodeLists.

member.name: T:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy
member.summary: A Proxy for a SitemapNode that adds metadata for tracking whether the node is in the current path, the host for the node, etc.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.HostProperty
member.summary: Gets the Host for the SitemapNode (e.g. TreeViewNavigator or BreadCrumbNavigator).

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.IsChildCurrentSourceProperty
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this node is in the current path but is not the current source.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.IsCurrentSourceProperty
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this node represents the current source.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.IsInPathProperty
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this node is in the current path.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.NodeProperty
member.summary: Gets the ISitemapNode to which this proxy corresponds.

member.name: F:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.NodesProperty
member.summary: Gets the trimmed list of child proxies that correspond to Node.Nodes.

member.name: M:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes the set of Child nodes, ensuring that it matches the list of child nodes for the underlying node.

member.name: P:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.Host
member.summary: Gets the Host for the SitemapNode (e.g. TreeViewNavigator or BreadCrumbNavigator).

member.name: P:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.IsChildCurrentSource
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this node is in the current path but is not the current source.

member.name: P:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.IsCurrentSource
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this node represents the current source.

member.name: P:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.IsInPath
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this node is in the current path.

member.name: P:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.Node
member.summary: Gets the ISitemapNode to which this proxy corresponds.

member.name: P:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.SitemapNodeProxy.Nodes
member.summary: Gets the trimmed list of child proxies that correspond to Node.Nodes.

member.summary: Represents a node within a Sitemap.

member.summary: An interface for SitemapNodes.

member.name: M:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.ISitemapNode.IsVisibleTo(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal)
member.summary: Determines whether this SitemapNode should be trimmed for the given principal.
member.param: The principal whose access should be tested.
member.returns: true if the principal should see this node and its children. false otherwise.

member.name: P:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.ISitemapNode.Description
member.summary: Gets the description for this SitemapNode.

member.summary: Gets whether this SitemapNode supports being navigated to.

member.summary: Gets list of child nodes for this SitemapNode.

member.name: P:SLaB.Navigation.Controls.Sitemap.ISitemapNode.TargetName
member.summary: Gets the target for this SitemapNode (e.g. _blank, _top, or the name of a Frame).

member.summary: Gets the title for this SitemapNode.

member.summary: Gets the Uri for this SitemapNode.

member.summary: Gets whether this SitemapNode supports being navigated to.

member.summary: Gets list of child nodes for this SitemapNode.

member.summary: Gets or sets the roles allowed for this SitemapNode. The roles can be a comma-separated list of Role names. "*" indicates that all roles should be able to see this SitemapNode.

member.summary: Gets or sets the target for this SitemapNode (e.g. _blank, _top, or the name of a Frame).
